children.name: Bolero Việt Nam
children.description: Romantic Vietnamese popular music, originating from standards mixing Latin American Bolero with local music.

children.name: Bolero Việt Nam
children.description: Romantic Vietnamese popular music, originating from standards mixing Latin American Bolero with local music.

children.name: Ca trù
children.description: Sung poetry from northern Vietnam, performed by a female vocalist to the accompaniment of a three-stringed lute and percussion.

children.name: Ca trù
children.description: Sung poetry from northern Vietnam, performed by a female vocalist to the accompaniment of a three-stringed lute and percussion.

children.name: Cải lương
children.description: Blends classical Vietnamese Opera with southern Vietnamese Folk Music and colonial French spoken melodrama.

children.name: Cải lương
children.description: Blends classical Vietnamese Opera with southern Vietnamese Folk Music and colonial French spoken melodrama.

children.name: Hát lô tô
children.description: Short songs performed in the Vietnamese lô tô game to reveal drawn numbers.

children.description: Short songs performed in the Vietnamese lô tô game to reveal drawn numbers.

children.name: Ngâm thơ
children.description: Vietnamese Poetry recitation backed by traditional instruments.

children.name: Ngâm thơ
children.description: Vietnamese Poetry recitation backed by traditional instruments.

children.name: Nhạc tiền chiến
children.description: Popular music with romantic and poetic lyrics largely written between 1930s and 1940s.

children.name: Nhạc tiền chiến
children.description: Popular music with romantic and poetic lyrics largely written between 1930s and 1940s.

children.name: Nhạc vàng
children.description: Made largely from the 1950s until the 1970s; introspective and sentimental lyrical themes.

children.name: Nhạc vàng
children.description: Made largely from the 1950s until the 1970s; introspective and sentimental lyrical themes.

children.name: Nhạc đỏ
children.description: Vietnamese revolutionary music, which may contain elements of Western Classical Music, Bolero Việt Nam, and Vietnamese Folk Music, and usually political and war-themed lyrics.

children.name: Nhạc đỏ
children.description: Vietnamese revolutionary music, which may contain elements of Western Classical Music, Bolero Việt Nam, and Vietnamese Folk Music, and usually political and war-themed lyrics.

children.name: Tân cổ giao duyên
children.description: Mixes the vọng cổ musical structure with popular, non-traditional Vietnamese music.

children.name: Tân cổ giao duyên
children.description: Mixes the vọng cổ musical structure with popular, non-traditional Vietnamese music.

children.name: Vietnamese Court Music
children.description: Traditional court music of Vietnam, specifically that of the Nguyễn dynasty.

children.name: Vietnamese Court Music
children.description: Traditional court music of Vietnam, specifically that of the Nguyễn dynasty.

children.name: Vietnamese Folk Music
children.description: Traditional Folk Music of the Vietnamese people, with traditions influenced by both Chinese Music and Austronesian culture through the Cham people.
